casebody.data:
STATE
v.
PARKER AND HOLLOWAY. No. 462P07. Supreme Court of North Carolina. September 21, 2007. Sofie Hosford, for Holloway. Anne M. Middleton, Kathleen U. Baldwin, Assistant Attorney Generals, Seth Edwards, District Attorney, for State of NC.

The following order has been entered on the motion filed on the 20th day of September 2007 by Defendant for Stay of Execution of the Judgment of Imprisonment:

"Motion Allowed by order of the Court in conference this the 21st day of September 2007."
